Body:
random.seed(42)
a = [getNextAddr(), getNextAddr()]
o1 = TestObj(a[0], [a[1]])
o2 = TestObj(a[1], [a[0]])
objs = [o1, o2]
assert not o1._isReady()
assert not o2._isReady()
doTicks(objs, 10.0, stopFunc=lambda : o1._isReady() and o2._isReady())
o1.waitBinded()
o2.waitBinded()
o1._printStatus()
assert o1._getLeader().address in a
assert o1._getLeader() == o2._getLeader()
assert o1._isReady()
assert o2._isReady()
o1.addValue(150)
o2.addValue(200)
doTicks(objs, 10.0, stopFunc=lambda : o1.getCounter() == 350 and o2.
    getCounter() == 350)
assert o1._isReady()
assert o2._isReady()
assert o1.getCounter() == 350
assert o2.getCounter() == 350
o1._destroy()
o2._destroy()
